member.name: ITfFnShowHelp.Show
member.summary: Called when the user selects a text service help menu item.
member.param: Handle of the parent window. This value can be NULL.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ITfFnShowHelp
member.summary: The ITfFnShowHelp interface is implemented by a text service to enable the language bar to place a help command for the text service in the language bar help menu.
